```{r}
install.packages("nlstools")
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(nlstools)
```

Nonlinear

```{r}
power_df <- read_excel("data/power_function.xlsx", 
                       range = cell_cols("A:E"), 
                       .name_repair = tolower)

with(power_df, plot(input1, output))

m1 <- lm(formula = log(output) ~ log(input1) + log(input2) + log(input3),
         data = power_df)
summary(m1)
plot(m1)
```


```{r}
g <- nls(formula = output ~ a * input1 ^ b * input2 ^ c * input3 ^ d,
         data = power_df,
         start = list(a = 2,
                      b = 0.5,
                      c = 0.5,
                      d = 0.5))

summary(g)

```
